website_summaries.verdict: The 3DS design of choice for dedicated Pokémon Sun and Pokémon Moon players.
pros: This jet-black New 3DS XL sports Pokémon Sun & Moon’s mascots, Solgaleo & Lunala, on both sides of the case
cons: Special edition 3DS models like this one can be pricy
Doesn't include a game or AC adapter

customer_reviews.title: Buy at your own risk!!!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I ran into the same problem as another buyer, which is I can’t used this system due it being from a different region. Amazon was nice enough to give me my money back and an apology. So please be aware you might not get a system from North America. I’ll post an update later on. Update: I got my refund and used the money on a new 2ds xl pikachu edition.
customer_reviews.author: Jose S.

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE US/ENGLISH VERSION!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the Arabic version of the game, I didn’t even open the box once I noticed that, it is in the details but it’s buried in there to where you don’t notice it readily, I read that it works ok with English versions of the games but if there’s warranty issues you have to send it to the Middle East for service. I’m not about to do that, so I returned it and we’ll be going to gamestop to get the US version guaranteed
customer_reviews.author: Abel

customer_reviews.title: FRAUDULENT - Not US Unit
customer_reviews.text: Bought device as a replacement for my daughter's 3DS unit. Description implied US unit. Unit shipped was region locked to UAE, Saudi Arabia, Singapore and Malaysia and box is clearly marked that it will play only those region's games. Box DOES NOT match the image in the product description. EDIT After much searching, the unit can be configured to play US games by selecting the region during the profile setup process, and then transferring the save games over. It’s still a fraudulent fulfillment of the listing - if you are selling potential non-US units, say so!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Vance

customer_reviews.title: Be carful buying.
customer_reviews.text: The home button and the charging port was smashed making it unplayable because there is no way now to charge it as well as the box it was in was smashed as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: I received the UAE version, which is not the version pictured. HOWEVER, as others have noted, the UAE edition is the same region (region U) as the NA console, meaning they are basically identical aside from their serial number prefix and the fact that you can't have Nintendo NA repair the system. I never send my consoles to the manufacturer for repairs (I handle my own), so that's not a concern of mine. During the system setup, just select U.S. for your region just as you normally would, and you're good to go. You can interface this device with the original NA consoles for download play, etc. There is no difference.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Raymond

customer_reviews.title: It is still NA region and plays NA games no problem
customer_reviews.text: First of all, don't worry about the region thing, it is still part of the NA region so it won't be region locked out of your games. Second, after that it is what it says it is, just disappointed from the region scare, they should have been more open about it. From what I saw, if you need it fixed then you will have to send it to Singapore or something, but I haven't had to do that with my old 3ds so I'm not too worried about this one breaking for no reason. Just be careful if you take it on the go. Old 3ds stylus is better imo, this one doesn't extend and feels lower quality
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Not American, but all my American games work.
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived in like new condition, no major problems after about a week. The box does state it is a Singapore/Malaysia console just as other reviews state, but I decided to load up a bunch of games I have, all English titles, and they all play and function properly. (I also threw in some old DS games and checked if they work and they do.) I would give this 5 stars, but I do feel they should let people know where this system comes from, for transparency sake, at least.
customer_reviews.author: James W Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Nice but overpriced!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Very nice piece but sad that prices get jacked up because it's hard to find last minute during the Christmas season. I wasn't even looking to buy this and when I saw it I wanted it for my daughter but after buying it and looking it up on other sites I realized I overpaid by a hundreds dollars and was upset. I look for deals but it was too late to cancel and too close to Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: EG

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Ok don’t get scared reading the reviews of some people saying that they got a non US 3ds and they can’t play their games. It’s true that in the box it says it’s from Singapore, but all you have to is start it up and switch the country to US if you want. I’m playing Pokémon sun and Animal crossing with no problems at all. The device came quick and it came with no scratches or anything. Overall very pleased with this purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: cesar penado

customer_reviews.title: 3DS gamer approved
customer_reviews.text: My son has been very pleased with this 3DS. It arrived in perfect condition. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Holley

customer_reviews.title: Already a hit
customer_reviews.text: This arrived today and my grandson began playing with it immediately. He was really impressed and can't wait until the new Mario game arrives tomorrow from Amazon. He called the graphics and spectacular.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra R. Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Amazon is turning into Ebay
customer_reviews.text: I received a Saudi Arabian/Malaysian region locked system. As I am from North America and have about 30 physical North American games this system is useless and had to return it right after I got it. Really bummed and wont buy another one from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful gaming system
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful gaming system. Get those screen protectors and clear case covers on and put it back in the box before you give it to the kid (or yourself) - and make sure to do all those updates and systems transfers if applicable! Made Christmas morning that much more exciting, and a lot less "Installing your updates now..."
customer_reviews.author: Mustin

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected, even better!
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing! I got it to play ultra sun, and had no issues as those in the reviews are stating like it falling apart or not a NA system. My box did have the purple sticker covering the UAE tag but, I believe it was just repackaging because it works totally fine. Only tiny issue is the screen sometimes goes a little dark but I'm assuming its just lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Seccuro

customer_reviews.title: No charger
customer_reviews.text: After paying over $ 200.00 for a Christmas gift for my grandson and granddaughter a peice, they as well as myself were very disappointed there was no charger. Had to wait until the next day to go and purchase 2 chargers. Not what I expected, more added cost.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Read me
customer_reviews.text: Perfect factory sealed. Obviously peeps that are writing neg reviews about getting non-regional consoles are just randomly ordering used. I just bout 2 of these. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: USA charger or not?
customer_reviews.text: So it is the Singapore/ non-US version but seems it will play our games, however it did not come with the AC Adapter and it’s difficult to tell if it will accept the usual US charger for DS. My kid loves the design and larger screen size, so I’d like to keep it, but does anyone know if it will accept the DS charger a available in US?
customer_reviews.author: JPHG

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT ASAP!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for fans of the Nintendo 3ds & 2ds. You need to buy it before these things are selling for 500$+. I've seen it happen over and over again with the popular systems once they stop producing them & sell our the old new stock even the used ones shoot way up in price.!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Does not include a charger!
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I’ve had so far was having to unscrew the back panel of the DS to insert the SD card it originally brings. Somehow it was lose and not correctly inserted. Other than that the only thing I didn’t like was that the description didn’t say anything about not having a charger included which is a bummer because I would of just bought the charger along side with it but now I have to go to the nearest store to get one. Product works great and the engraved Pokemon finish looks amazing. Would definitely recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: John Viera

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: screen developed an inside the screen face shaped black image. can't use it due to not being able to see around the smudge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed to Enjoyment
customer_reviews.text: There should have been a charger included with this system for the price thats charged. My grandson is enjoying the game but had to wait until the day after Christmas because there was no charger
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: The package surprised me. the last time I bought a Nintendo handheld was 2010 in Japan and it was a DSi LL, That Packaging was much better than this and it cost only 18000 Japanese yen(less than 180 USD at the time). But I am very satisfied with the 3ds itself, brought back my memories from the DS and PSP time.
customer_reviews.author: Bill C.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as promised by the seller. Package delivered with all contents, as described and in perfect condition. No surprises. Am very, well pleased with the product and seller. Sincerely, D. McClain
customer_reviews.author: Debra L McClain

customer_reviews.title: The 3DS was new and in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: Product came new, no scratches on the shell or screens. Does not come with a charger, in case anyone didn't read the product description. Only thing I didn't like is that there was no packing in the box around the product, I was concerned it could have been damaged in shipping. Thankfully everything is good to go and functions perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Corey S

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try Nintendo in North America. I like the design because it is clean and the price is fine. The limited edition price is similar to the regular edition, so I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Rayden

customer_reviews.title: Not what was expected or described
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t the NA version. Nowhere was it stated that it was possible to not receive the NA version. The Middle Eastern Label was covered with a sticker.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T.

customer_reviews.title: Falsely claims to be a North American region 3DS
customer_reviews.text: Product listing is for a North American region 3DS. I received a 3DS region locked to the Saudi Arabia/South East Asia region with stickers covering up the parts of the box that say what region it's for. It was not the box pictured - it looked similar, but several elements were in different places or said slightly different things. It would not connect to the internet or play any North American region games. This is a fraudulent listing, and it's very shady that this still shows up as "Amazon's Choice" despite many similar reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine, zero problems
customer_reviews.text: I bought without reading a single review, got the item and it worked fine with all NA games I bought for it. I haven't had a single problem, I also can use eShop with no problem, I honestly have no idea what everyone is talking about.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: My daugter LOVES it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter as a birthday gift, and she could not be any happier! Gorgeous console! Came new in an untouched box
customer_reviews.author: Ana Karina Smith Cain

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to play
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to start playing on the 3ds xl all my friends has one and they love it
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Bowen

customer_reviews.title: New item is missing the charger
customer_reviews.text: I just spend 200 dollars on a "new" nintento 3ds and it was missing the charger!! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: No charger.. really?
customer_reviews.text: Did not know it did not come with a charger. What electronic that requires to be charged does not come with a charger?? Would have been nice to know this before Christmas and every store is closed. Did not notice the teeny tiny “charger not included” label on the box until today.. Definitely put a damper on Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Region locked: Saudi Arabia/ Malaysian UAE Nintendo 3DS
customer_reviews.text: Seller information needs to include that this is a UAE version Nintendo 3DS. Will not support NA games. I am in the process of returning item. Otherwise system looks as described.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Larger screens, better viewing for gameplay!!
customer_reviews.text: Great entertainment!!! Larger screens! Easy to handle! I love this!!
customer_reviews.author: Mape

customer_reviews.title: Really like it.
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I got this DS, I do have to say the weird thing it does is dim at anytime. It has a big screen so I’m able to see my games.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sons birthday and it will not turn on. He charged it for several hours, tested the battery, it was good, but still nothing. So disappointing and now I have to figure out how to get it fixed or send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I waited until I played with it to review. I've had it now 2 weeks roughly. It came exactly when it said it would. No scratches nor damage. Works just fine. The screen gets a little dark when playing but nothing serious at the moment. Its great😁. Very happy and it is a new New Nintendo 3ds Xl
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany McLeod

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with charger
customer_reviews.text: As stated in the description, does not come with a charger, so make sure to order one on amazon at the same time. Overall, the product is very nice and affordable compared to the other options. the black case looks great in person.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Hauff

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed - Charger doesn’t come with the game.
customer_reviews.text: Warning to anyone looking to purchase this item - it does not come with a charger. You have to buy it separately. I have never bought a game system that came without a charger! So disappointed now my grandson has to wait 2-3 days before the charger comes so he can play it!
customer_reviews.author: Penny Nance

customer_reviews.title: Pokemon Rules
customer_reviews.text: The picture doesn't do it justice! The case is really pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Alice Quinones

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter saved up her allowance to purchase this. Was everything she was hoping for. Great images on product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Cool DS, needs case to prevent scratches
customer_reviews.text: This is a super cool DS, I love the design. The 3D feature is alright, but I wish it came with a charger. I recommend getting a clear plastic case because the design is glossy and not matte, so it will scratch easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outer design a big hit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my granddaughter, she loved it. She had a 3DS XL before so nothing new there but she is a big pokemon fan and really liked the cover design on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Kaminski

customer_reviews.title: Quick Delivery
customer_reviews.text: My daughter seems to like it. Well for one day. Xbox and a gaming computer no clue why she wanted it.
customer_reviews.author: robroy

customer_reviews.title: Good System
customer_reviews.text: Works great, a lot of improvements of the old 3ds systems. I only wish the system transfer took fewer steps
customer_reviews.author: Chris Arns

customer_reviews.title: Just What Grandson Wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I know nothing about this except my 13 year old grandson says is it the very best and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend buying
customer_reviews.text: The 3-D graphics are amazing! My 9 year old son is in heaven since he received it for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DS for Anime lovers!
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift so we have not actually used it yet but I love the look and since this is probably our 5th ds over the years I am sure it will not disappoint. The DS XL was as the top of my sons Xmas list this year and he is going to love the anime-like design on the cover.
customer_reviews.author: A.M

customer_reviews.title: Quickly Shipped
customer_reviews.text: Brand new, unopened. Very fast shipping without an upcharge. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: LiivingD3adGirl

customer_reviews.title: My sons Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: Only a few months old and the right camera button stopped working. Went to Nintendo support and they couldn’t find a related product with the serial number provided. At a loss for what to do.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Bueno

customer_reviews.title: 3DS
customer_reviews.text: My child loves this. No issues after months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of two

customer_reviews.title: Adapter doesn’t come with!!
customer_reviews.text: For a $200+ item, it’s super annoying that it doesn’t include the adapter. SERIOUSLY?? We got this weeks ago and stashed away for my son’s birthday—go to wrap it properly only to find no way to charge it. Shame on Nintendo for making a unique adapter and shame on seller for not including one. Fie!!
customer_reviews.author: Berlin Bear

customer_reviews.title: Potentially refurbished and missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: The one I received was missing the stylus and all the a/r cards. The screen also acted funny in 3D mode. Clearly a refurbished and not brand new. Seems to vary depending on the seller. My recommendation is to look over the one you receive very carefully. Mine is going back.
customer_reviews.author: Saviorself

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Beautiful, works like a charm. -1 star because the case and packaging doesn’t include a charger, which is just par for Nintendo’s course with handhelds, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Medlin

customer_reviews.title: Its good
customer_reviews.text: Came in as it states, with no ac adapter and in the box, 100% works , bought for a friend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. Some of the reviews expressed concern that it was made for another region, but he thought it would work, and it did. New condition, nice design.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Jones

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it so I guess is an awesome game device.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: FRAUD!  Wrong Region For US!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this! It is the wrong region and cannot be repaired in the US!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E. Good

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband and he loves it! Works great brand new in box the design is sketched in not a sticker just perfect quality my husband loves it
customer_reviews.author: Juliet Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I got to say this was one of the fastest shipments i ever got from amazon. I dont even care that the system is not a north American version because 1 my games still work and 2 because the system came looking crisp asf
customer_reviews.author: elvis ramriez

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I bought it specifically for Sun & Moon and I do not regret it. Of course it's your standard 3DS but it's really the art and look of the device that makes this 3DS stand out. It has a very nice and sleek finish and the decals are really good.
customer_reviews.author: IBuyStuff

customer_reviews.title: Not USA version
customer_reviews.text: This isnt USA version??? I cant use the console, wow extremely dissapointed. Dont buy from this seller if your in america.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Charger sold separately
customer_reviews.text: It looks good but when I got it It didnt have a charger and I looked in the instructions and it says the charger is sold separately it is just a scam for money
customer_reviews.author: Anne B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Condition - New
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Perfect condition, all materials included are untouched. Faster delivery would be nice, but 5 days isn't bad in these times.
customer_reviews.author: Saephyr

customer_reviews.title: NOT an American Model - Nintendo Will Not Support!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this from NB Sales on 2/2/20 - by September it stopped working. I contacted Nintendo support who told me that based on the serial number it was not a model to be sold in the US. The serial # begins with QS - this indicates that it is for sale in the Middle East & Southeast Asia!
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel K

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! The bigger screen is amazing. Since I'm a adult it fits my hands much better. I was also lucky enff to get it from the Nintendo store on here and not a 3rd party who jacked the price up. It is definitely worth the 199.99$
customer_reviews.author: Christen Holden

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT INCLUDE CHARGER
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves it!!! My only complaint is that it does NOT come with a charger. Glad I read the box when I received it or I would have had a disappointed boy on Christmas morning.
customer_reviews.author: Baileygirl210

customer_reviews.title: The individual was happy to receive the 3DS XL
customer_reviews.text: I brought the item as a gift. The individual was quite happy with the item. He also like the design on the front of the 3DS XL.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Handheld
customer_reviews.text: Besides the obvious fact the handheld skin is different, it operates great like one would expect.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: My son could not be happier.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome looking 3DS XL and my son has enjoyed every second of it. If you own this 3DS I highly recommend you save the box and everything that came with it because this 3DS will only be worth more down the road.
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend is super happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend is super happy with this purchase, I am jealous myself of how good this special release New 3DS XL looks!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product to any Pokémon fan
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for a friend. He loves it!! Product arrived on time, and undamaged. I would recommend this product to any Pokémon fan!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina M. Pundt-Coronado

customer_reviews.title: Pokemon lovers nintendo.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! A must have for pokemon lovers. They make other designs that are cheaper though if you aren't stuck on pokemon.

customer_reviews.title: It can take a while to do a complete data ...
customer_reviews.text: It can take a while to do a complete data transfer from old Nintendo 3ds to the new Nintendo 3ds but worth it if you want a larger screen.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Higgs

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my son who is extremely happy with it. He said it is bigger than he expected but that makes the games better to see and easier to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Sandretta

customer_reviews.title: Brand new
customer_reviews.text: The 3ds was still in package and was brand new when I opened it. I was more than a little excited and I'd definitely recommend it to someone who wants a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Levi Crouse

customer_reviews.title: It's a great piece.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 7 year old who loves Pokémon. It's a great piece.
customer_reviews.author: Jaleel

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I have received the product and it was just wrapped in clear wrap. It was exactly as described and so far I am completely happy with the purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Not a US version.
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware, the recent restock seems to be units from Malaysian, despite being shipped from the US. WILL NOT PLAY NORTH AMERICAN GAMES!!!

customer_reviews.title: No ips screens
customer_reviews.text: I really like this but it doesn’t even have one ips screen so 4* for me

customer_reviews.title: Second screen is not functioning
customer_reviews.text: The lower/second screen is not functioning properly. The box also was not sealed, which may mean it was used before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Service
customer_reviews.text: Product was in great condition just as the description said. It was fully charged on arrival. Arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Price is great considering it is a special edition of a discontinued hardware. Delivered on time and in mint condition.

customer_reviews.title: Delight
customer_reviews.text: It’s look great and condition having lots of fun playing Thankyou so much

customer_reviews.title: I recommend for anyone who like sun and moon game
customer_reviews.text: My brother loves the design on this 3ds. I recommend for anyone who like sun and moon game.

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Good price, and fast shipping! The only problem was that I had to open up the console, because the sd card slipped out of the slot, probably in shipping. Otherwise works great!
customer_reviews.author: [REDACTED]

customer_reviews.title: So far no issues with the game play or the ...
customer_reviews.text: So far no issues with the game play or the controls, only part that was slightly time consuming was changing the miniSD card.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase it definitely plays all my north American gamea

customer_reviews.text: The item was great except for the price. Cost too much for something that is cheaper somewhere else.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Still good as new and my sons loves it. The case keeps it clean and new too.

customer_reviews.title: and my son LOVED it!
customer_reviews.text: came on time! and my son LOVED it!! everything included except the charging cable. I thought this was weird, but I soon found out the charging cable is only 14.99 at gamestop!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grandson was very, very excited u mean very excited. Loves it very much.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Seen reviews of it being from a foreign country. But my games still play fine, as long as you select your region to be USA i believe.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Daughter is loving this! Highly recommend if purchasing for a child ages 8-12

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really love this gaming system! I absolutely love the design!
customer_reviews.author: Zackmum4

customer_reviews.title: ... son loves this 3DS and I could not be happier with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this 3DS and I could not be happier with my purchase. Great game system.
customer_reviews.author: RenDW

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Best decision I have ever made! I bought this last year when it was 200 bucks now it jumps up about 150 bucks. I bought two. One for personal use and one unopened. This unopened item will be worth alot in the future! Good investment!
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: Awesome redesign of the shell
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and it's absolutely awesome. It only comes with the 3DS (you need to buy a charging cable if you don't already own one). This New 3DS also comes with built-in support for amiibos which I think is crazy. The glossy black outer shell is gorgeous and the inner black has a nice matte black look. The device is a good size for playing more action packed games. Overall an awesome design for the 3DS XL if you don't already own one. **Note: this does not come with Sun or Moon. The games must be purchased separately.
customer_reviews.author: TheOriginalPancake

customer_reviews.title: Wrong region
customer_reviews.text: I was really upset with the wrong region of the console because it's my birthday gift, but nevermind it can be connected to a Canada profile.
customer_reviews.author: Denis Bozhinski

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item from etrader2008, and it claimed to be an open-box return. Although the seal on the box was broken, the item looks as if it had never been touched. I am very satisfied with this purchase. Beautiful art on the shell as well! Shipping was incredibly fast! I really could not be any happier!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hansen

product_meta.title: Nintendo New 3DS XL Solgaleo Lunala Black Edition
product_meta.description:
THE NEXT DIMENSION IN ENTERTAINMENT The New Nintendo 3DS XL system combines next-generation portable gaming with super-stable 3D technology and added control features. Take 3D photos, connect with friends, and enhance your gaming experiences with added amiibo support.

The New Nintendo 3DS XL system plays all Nintendo DS games. Nintendo DS games will not appear in 3D.

AC Adapter sold separately. New Nintendo 3DS XL uses the same AC adapter as Nintendo DSi, Nintendo 3DS and 2DS.

3D Mode recommended for Ages 7+
feature_bullets: The New Nintendo 3DS XL system plays all Nintendo DS games. Nintendo DS games will not appear in 3D
AC Adapter sold separately. New Nintendo 3DS XL uses the same AC adapter as Nintendo DSi, Nintendo 3DS and 2DS.
